item.title: Japan's top automaker Toyota taps earnings expert as its chief amid declining profits

item.title: FACT FOCUS: Trump says tariffs have created an economic miracle. The facts tell a different story
item.description: President Donald Trump claims his tariffs have revived the U_S_ economy, calling it an “American economic miracle.”
